content: I'm excited to try out Insight Timer and explore its features. I've been thinking about incorporating some relaxing music into my bedtime routine, so the ambient sounds feature sounds perfect. Also, I'll definitely check out those yoga channels on YouTube, thanks for the recommendations! Since I went out for dinner with friends at a new Italian place that just opened up downtown today, I was thinking of trying to cook some Italian dishes at home. Do you have any simple Italian recipes or cookbooks you'd recommend for a beginner like me?
